Ultralytics 人工智能模型被劫持，通过加密货币挖矿程序感染数千人https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/ultralytics-ai-model-hijacked-to-infect-thousands-with-cryptominer/ Fri, 06 Dec 2024 13:54:22 -0500比尔·图拉斯SecurityArtificial IntelligenceSoftware https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/ultralytics-ai-model-hijacked-to-infect-thousands-with-cryptominer/ The popular Ultralytics YOLO11 AI model was compromised in a supply chain attack to deploy cryptominers on devices running versions 8.3.41 and 8.3.42 from the Python Package Index (PyPI) [...]
